On a sunny day in town Dave and his friends are walking around, bored out of their collective minds, when Dave spots a new store in town to go check out.

"Lets check out what kinda place that new store is."

"Looks like an antique store or something" says Brandon as they walk past the large glass store front

"Nessesary Things" Dave mumbles to himself "That seems so familiar like I've heard of it before"

"What'd you say?" asked Britt

"Nothin', lets check it out"

When they enter the store everyone feels that things just dont look right but no one says anything. The curios in the store arent what looks wrong, nothing creepy or demonic looking. Old lamps, chairs, and tables, even a red coke cooler from a 50s era diner stuff almost every inch of the shop leaving just enough room for walking space between them. Everything covered in an thick coating of dust making the old items look even older. But a new store that wasn't there a week ago looks as if everything inside has been sitting undisturbed for years, thick cobwebs connect things to each other as the cobwebs themselves where holding the items together. Dave picks up an old handcarved wooden box an is about to open it. Suddenly a sound as if an old car with a bad engine were starting arises in the stuffed shop. Startled by the noise everyone turns around to see the sound coming from the throught of an old man who looks as if he to has been sitting undisturbed in the shop for years along with all the antiques. When the old mans coughs finally sounds as if the engine has started he stops coughing, and looks right at Dave and only at Dave as if the other 3 people in the store didnt even exist.

"What can I do ya for?" he asked with a voice that sounded like an old car revving its engine

"Nothin really just looking" Dave responds trying to dodge the old mans stare.

"I've never seen this store before but looks like you've been here for ages how long have you been here?" questions Rachel

"Long enough." responds the old man never breaking his glare upon Dave but showing that he obviously knows there is more than just one person here "Nice eye you have there, quite a rare find."

"Yea its beautifully carved never seen anything like it. How much?"

"$7000"

"Its a nice box but no way this is worth 7000 unless it was owned by Jesus himself"

"Screw the box whats inside is what counts" Dave opens the box to reveal a quite unremarkable cheap stereotypical looking magicians wand. Dave looked at the man with a "haha nice joke" look.

"Seriously? This cheap piece of crap worth 7000?"

"OH yes worth more than you can imagine but 7000 sounded like a good price but I could part with it for less."

"How much?"

"Not money but if you would do a favor for me when I ask I'll let you have it."

"He's not gonna have to kill anyone is he?" Brandon asked in a mocking tone

"No nothing like that. But do we have a deal?"

"Ok sure"

"Great!" he yelped sounding as if the car his voice sounded like had backfired. and proceeded to wrap the box is paper and hand it to Dave, then he turned and walked back into his storeroom as if no more pleasantries were needed. and everyone looked at each other and left the store not wanting to deal with the old man anymore.

"Why the hell did you get that thing?" asked Jakie

"Hey it was basically free and his favor is probably gonna be asking me to mow his lawn or something. The wand is worthless but I bet can get a good amount reselling the box."

"Whatever lets go home." said Jakie

"What? Its a beautiful day out and look at all the ladies?" Brandon said smiling at the 2 girls sitting at a table at the outside cafe.

"There are some carvings on the side. It's kinda interesting, but the light in here sucks. I'm just going to take a look. Is that alright with you?" Dave replied.

"Sure, whatever," Brandon waved his hand dismissing Dave and went back to his conversation with the girls. As he was closing the door to his room Dave noticed Brandon's eyes went right to Jackie's boobs. Jackie seemed to notice and though she blushed a little she also, very discretely, leaned forward exposing more of her glorious cleavage. Dave felt a slight sting of jealousy, but dismissed it as he had more pressing issues at hand.

Dave quickly entered the bathroom and locked the door behind him. Looking at himself in the mirror he decided that his body needed an overhaul. His whole life he'd been short and pudgy. All through high school he'd been pushed around by the jocks who felt entitled just because they had better genes. Dave decided it was time to beef up.

He concentrated on a mental image of his desired size and thought about how amazing it would be to have super human strength. Then, when he was satisfied he gave the wand a flick.

White light shot from the tip and enveloped Dave's body from head to toe. For a moment he was blinded, but then his sight slowly returned. What he saw was his body expanding as if every muscle he had were hooked up to an air hose. He was already taller, and still growing, his current height at around the 6 foot mark. His shoulders had broadened out to the point that he was certain he would no longer fit through any doorway in his home. His chest had surged forward a full foot beyond his chin and his view was completely blocked beyond his massive pecs.

Since he couldn't see beyond his incredible chest Dave raised his right arm and flexed his mighty biceps. The peak shot into the air, his sinewy limb cut with incredible definition had veins crisscrossing the surface. His arm already measured 27" around, and he was still growing. He straightened his arm and flexed again watching with glee as his arm swelled even larger this time. Dave repeated this motion five times, each time his guns grew ever bigger. By the time his expansion had stopped his arms measured a mind-blowing, world record 34".

Dave stepped back from the sink so he could admire his new body in the mirror and noticed that the bathroom around him had changed. It was twice as large and very luxurious. There were marble counter tops and gold plated faucets. The bathtub now looked more like a jacuzzi than anything else, and the entire wall opposite the sink was one giant mirror. Dave wasn't sure what had brought about this remodeling, but he liked it.

Dave turned to the floor to ceiling mirror and examined his new body. He was now wearing blue cotton shorts that, despite their size, were shrink wrapped to his massive quads, revealing every curve, peak, and valley below. He flexed his legs and could hear the seams stretching to their limit. Turning to his side he flexed his calf muscles and found them to be easily the size of large cantaloupe. His upper body was shirtless and majestic. Dave ran his fingers over his abdominal muscles. The 8 ridges on his belly were like cobblestones. He then raised his arm, put his hand behind his head and and flexed his oblique abdominal along his right side. The muscles that sprouted up resembled piano keys.

Finally Dave put his hands on his hips and flexed his enormous chest. His pectorals now surged out to a foot and a half past where his chin ended. In the mirror he could clearly see his lats spreading like wings.

"This is incredible," Dave told his reflection.

As he turned to leave the bathroom Dave found that the door leading out was wider and could accommodate his enlarged frame, though just barely.

Stepping back out into the hall he noticed that not only the bathroom had grown, but the entire house had as well. He was walking the halls of some mansion, though when he looked out a window he saw that he still lived on the same street. It was as though his parents had bought all the land that surrounded his home and built an enormous home in place of the old one.

Just as he was wondering which of the 9 doors that lined the hall was the one to his room and his friends he heard their voices. Following the sound lead him to a huge rumpus room with various game tables, arcade games and even an indoor pool near the window on the far side. He found Jackie, Rachel, Brittany, and Brandon gathered around a 90" plasma television playing video games.

As he approached them he was somewhat relieved to find that Jackie still had her enlarged boobs, but nothing else about the group had changed.

"Jeez, man," Brandon said, "What happened, did you fall in or something?"

"What?" Dave asked, snapping back to reality.

Rachel laughed, "You know, I'm terrified that I'm going to fall in every time I use that gigantic toilet. I know you need to have them custom built for you, but couldn't you have a bathroom with normal sized toilets too. One of these days I'm not going to come back."

They all laughed. There were so many questions Dave wanted to ask, but he knew he just had to play along since this reality was one that they were all used to.

Dave settled into one of the couches near the TV and looked over his friends while he contemplated his next move.

Maybe Dave could call his friends over and use the wand? Or maybe he could do something to Tim after all?

"Oh, great!" Tim groaned. "Now look what you did, you moron! You broke it!"

Dave looked on and saw the broken wand. Somehow, Tim didn't see a faint, blue stream of magic flowing from the wand's tip, and encircling Tim's body.

"Hey! The wand's magic... It's all around you! Don't you see it?" Dave spoke up.

"See what? I don't see anything!" Tim said, as he looked down at his muscular body. For some reason, Dave was the only person who was able to see the wand's magic.

"It's all around you!"

"Yeah right... Well I'm gonna hang out with Joey and the rest of the gang down the street..." Tim sighed, as he got up and walked out the door.

Dave decided to follow Tim, from a distance.

As soon as Tim walked out, he came across Joshua, who was kicking a soccer ball outside.

"Hey..." Tim said to Josh, who was about 8 years old. Josh was wearing shorts and a t-shirt and a pair of sneakers.

The minute Tim started speaking to Josh, Josh's muscles began to inflate!

"Holy crap!" Dave gasped, as he witnessed Josh's growth spurt from a distance, even though Tim and Josh acted like they didn't notice anything unusual.

Josh's calves ballooned out and his quads grew thicker and wider. His biceps bulged and his pecs pushed outwards and sideways. Josh grew a foot taller and he transformed into a big muscle kid, within seconds. He was almost as big as Tim!

Tim then walked away and met Joey, in front of his house, when the same transformation happened again.

"Oh no... all his friends are gonna become huge muscle giants!" Dave gasped.

What happens next?

11413212111.content:
Dave was following Tim from a distance, right after the wand had broken in half and after he had seen how the wand’s magic had engulfed his younger, muscular brother all over his body. Dave had also seen what happened when Tim started talking to Josh, the boy next door. Josh just started hulking out, and nobody noticed!

Tim decided to walk to the park, down the street, where several kids were playing Frisbee.

A boy from Tim’s class, named Liam, had tossed a Frisbee at him, and Tim had easily caught it with his big, muscular arm. Instead of throwing it back at him, Tim just walked over to him and started talking to him.

“Oh no… Not again!” Dave sighed as he was hiding behind a tree and watching the scene from a distance.

While Tim was talking to Liam, who was clearly shorter and smaller than him, the boy suddenly started growing right before his very eyes, even though he didn’t seem to notice anything unusual about him!

Suddenly, Liam started growing taller and taller! Liam grew from 5 feet tall to almost 6 feet tall in just a few seconds! Then, the boy started to hulk out rapidly. Since he was wearing shorts and a t-shirt, Dave was able to see everything that was happening to him.

While Tim was talking to Liam, Liam started to grow more muscular! His chest doubled in size as his pectorals pushed outwards and sideways with his big lets spreading out, giving him a V-taper. His legs became incredibly muscular as well, with his quads doubling in width and in thickness as well. Thick veins soon covered over them as layers of hard muscles formed over them like big teardrops above the knees.

Liam’s calves then ballooned outward like big basketballs, engulfed by a spider web of veins like ropes all over them. They were like footballs in the shape of diamonds sticking out from the back of his legs. Massive abdominals were surfacing over his torso like blocks on a wall and they lined up like bricks.

Lastly, Liam’s arms thickened and grew so big, that they looked like sewer pipes. His biceps were like medicine balls as they became big and round and hard as rocks.

“Okay, well I gotta go!” Tim said, as he turned around and walked off, leaving Liam as a huge, super-muscular kid with the body of a bodybuilder!

As Tim walked towards the lake, where kids were feeding bread to the ducks in the pond, Dave quietly walked up to Liam, who had grabbed a hot dog from his parents’ picnic table.

“Hey, Liam!” Dave said to the massive, muscular boy.

“Hiya Dave!”

“How’s going?”

The boy was still just as friendly as always. Dave remembered that Liam was only ten years old! In fact, he still looked like a ten-year-old boy, except that he now had the body of a muscle man!

“Good! I’m just feeding my muscles, I guess!” the huge boy chuckled as he took another bite from his hot dog.

“Don’t you find it strange that you just grew so muscular while talking to my brother Tim just now?” Dave asked him.

“What?” he replied. “No! I’ve always been muscular like this! What are you talking about?”

Dave replied that reality had also been altered and Dave was the only one who was aware of it! What was he going to do now?

A few seconds later, Johnny, the boy who was walking outside, also started to hulk out, practically bursting out of his shirt while his enormously muscular legs quickly ripped out of his shorts. The poor kid had no idea what was going on, but he certainly became a junior bodybuilder in no time!

A few houses down the street, a teenage girl began to feel her muscles inflate! Her calves and her quads filled out, making her burst out of her jeans and her socks. Then, as her arms bulged out with amazing muscle, she ripped through her blouse as well. The girl had no idea what was going on, but she was amazingly muscular!

Tim ran into the bathroom and closed and locked the door behind him. then, he stood before the large mirror, pointing the wand straight at himself with the tip of the wand pointing straight at the mirror.

"Okay, wand! I want you to fix yourself and to restore all your power to the fullest!" Tim said out loud, while holding the wand in his right hand.

A bright blue light shot from the tip of the wand, striking the mirror and then bouncing back in a straight, horizontal line. The blue light then engulfed the wand, mending itself completely! Every tear, crack or chip in the wood of the old wand was mended, and the wand was suddenly like new again, for the first time in centuries! But, that was not all! The blue light traveled from the wand down to Tim's arm, and through the rest of his body as well!

"Ohhh man... Ahh... This... This feels great..." Tim whispered to himself as his entire body was illuminated by the wand's powerful glow. "I feel it.... I can feel your power... You're a part of me now... I can summon you into my hand any time I want... Nobody will ever take you away from me..."

Meanwhile, Dave was standing outside the bathroom door.

"Tim? Are you okay? Come out of there!" he said. "What are you doing?"

The door opened and Tim came out, holding the wand.

"Give me the wand!" Dave said.

Tim just smiled and gave the wand to his brother.

"Hey! It looks like new!" Dave remarked, as he examined the wand.

Tim casually walked over to the kitchen and got something to drink before sitting down on the couch. Then, something weird happened.

Tim sat down on the couch and extended his muscular arm.

"Here, wand!" he said.

The wand flew out of Dave's hands and it magically hovered over to Tim's extended arm, several feet away!

"Hey! What the heck!" Dave gasped.

"Haha!" Tim grinned. "The wand will always come back to me!"

1141321212221.content:
Tim felt a jolt, as the energy of the wand coursed throughout his entire body, even down to his toes. Excitedly, Tim rushed over to the bathroom mirror, to watch his body change.

His already bodybuilder-sized physique practically exploded with even more growth. Pound after pound of solid muscle appeared out of nowhere, as if every part of his body was connected to an air hose. He was becoming taller, as well, already standing around 5’5”.

Tim’s chest surged forward, becoming thicker and more defined, while his shoulders grew to monstrous proportions, his frame widening considerably.

He looked down, noticing his arms were bigger than an IFBB pro’s at this point. He flexed, grinning as the softball-sized bicep slowly became larger. Twenty four inches, then 26”, then 28”. His triceps dipped lower as he flexed, the horseshoe shape becoming more defined as time passed.

“Tim!” Dave said, knocking on the door. “What are you doing in there?”

“I’m just…testing out the wand,” Tim replied, lowering his arm, as he watched his body swell larger. “I’ll be out in a minute.”

Suddenly, Tim’s growth accelerated. His massive chest inflated further, jutting out like a thick piece of armor. His shoulders became bigger than cannonballs, while his frame broadened to the point where he was much, much wider than the bathroom door. His arms were gargantuan, probably larger than Dave’s head by now.

All the while, Tim continued to grow taller. He was already up to seven and a half feet tall, his legs becoming impossibly huge. And still, his growth continued.

Outside the bathroom, Dave had no idea what was going on. His brother had barely made a sound for the past couple of minutes. Dave was getting worried.

“Are you SURE you’re okay?” Dave asked, tempted to break down the door.

“I’m fine,” Timmy replied, a little annoyed. He marveled at his Hulk-like physique, striking a few poses. “This shouldn’t take much longer.”

Finally, as Tim’s height grew to 8’6”, his growth stopped, a mere six inches from the ceiling. After checking himself out one more time, Tim hunkered down, lightly gripping the knob.

“About time,” Dave said, as the door slowly opened. “I was wondering what…happened…” He trailed off, as he saw his brother trying to exit the bathroom. His body was turned sideways, as he slowly shimmied his way out into the hallway, before standing up to his full height.

Dave took a few steps back, looking his brother up and down, speechless. He noticed feet almost 3 times larger than his own. Legs thicker than tree trunks and nearly the same size as Dave’s body. Abs harder than cobblestones and incredibly defined. A massive chest larger than anything Dave had ever seen before. Gargantuan arms and shoulders wider than any doorway in the house. He was the living embodiment of The Incredible Hulk, Timmy’s favorite superhero.

**Something like this…*

[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/vowr9l.jpg[/IMG]

Tim leaned down slightly, delighted that the top of his brother’s head only reached the middle of his abs. “So, what do you think of the new me?” he asked, his voice sounding the same as always.

“Timmy…what…W’What did you do?!”

“Like I said,” Tim replied. “I wanted to test out the wand. Make sure it worked. I think it works fine, don’t you?”
“But, Tim. You’re so…so HUGE!”

“Yeah, I know,” Tim said, matter-of-factly. “It’s the body I’ve always dreamed of having. Now, if you’ll excuse me.” He quickly brushed past Dave, heading downstairs and for the front door.

Dave followed after him. “Wait! Where do you think you’re going? You can’t just leave!”

Tim stopped, looking back. “Oh? And are YOU going to stop me?” Dave didn’t say anything. He couldn’t stop his 9 year old brother even if he wanted to. Tim was impossible huge now. And, since he idolized The Incredible Hulk, he feared Tim was also the strongest being on the planet.

Tim scoffed. “Thought so. Face it: You can’t boss me around anymore. I’m bigger than you. A LOT bigger.” With that, Tim left, walking down the street, the ground thudding with each step he took.

Dave just stood by the front door, watching his brother. When, suddenly, it dawned on him: Maybe the wand was still in the bathroom. He quickly bolted up the stairs, hoping Tim had left it behind.

When he got to the bathroom, Dave noticed…

11413212122212.content:
Dammit!" dave exclaimed. "Tim must have taken the wand with him." He ran downstairs, watching as his brother walked out of sight, turning onto the next street.

"I can still follow Tim around, find out what he plans to do," Dave thought to himself, as he left the house. "No matter what, I CANNOT let Tim use the wand on his friends. With an magination as active as his, there's no telling what he might think of."

Dave stopped at the corner, hunkering down behind a parked car. Tim was Already at one of his friend's houses. He thought his name was John, but he wasn't sure. Dave couldn't hear what the kids were saying--he was at least six houses down and trying his best to remain hidden--but there was the initial reaction of shock on John's face. After he relaxed, Tim squatted down, so the two could talk more easily. After a minute of so, Tim left his friend's porch, going to his next diestination, with John practically running to keep up with him.

As soon as they were out of sight, Dave was on the move again, following a safe distance behind the two. And so, the process repeated itself two more times, with a few subtle differences each time. The first kid was all too eager to go with Tim, running out into his front yard the second he saw the giant 9 year old coming. While the other took a bit more coaxing. He ran inside of his house and it took John and the other regular-sized kid a couple of minutes to convince him to come outside.

With three of his closest friends with him, Tim made his way down the street, before stopping at the corner. He turned around to face his friends. Quickly, Dave hid behind a nearby house. Luckily, this time he could hear every word.

“I know I promised to wait until we got to our secret hideout, but I can’t. I have to do this now.” Tim produced the wand from his back pocket and pointed it at his friends. Dave could only watch from the side of the house as the wand lit up and engulfed all three of Tim’s friends in a bright, white light, forcing Dave to shield his eyes momentarily.

When he was able to open them again, Dave couldn’t believe what he saw. All three kids were the same size as Timmy. They were all looking their bodies over, amazed at how massive they were now.

“Wow!” one kid, named Tyler, exclaimed. “This is so awesome!”

“I feel like the strongest kid in the world,” Seth, the other friend said.

“I knew you guys would like it,” Tim replied. “So, are you ready?”

“To go to our hideout? Sure,” John said. “But aren’t we going to stick out? I mean, look at us.”

A sly grin formed on Tim’s face. “Just do what I do. I know a shortcut.” Suddenly, Tim leapt into the air, his enormous legs propelling him for more than a mile, before he landed, intentionally slamming his feet as hard as he could into the earth. The small quake that followed was felt all throughout the town and nearly caused Dave to fall down.

The other three boys followed suit, landing near Tim, with four distinct craters formed in a wooded area on the other side of town.

Dave slowly made his way out to the sidewalk, his body shaking, though it was from fear rather than from one of the earthquakes Tim and his friends had just caused.

Dave started the two block walk back to his house to get his car, but he was in no hurry. He was going to drive to the other side of town, find his brother’s secret hideout—which he didn’t even know existed until a few minutes ago—and try to get the wand back.

But Dave had no idea how he was going to do that. Having ONE Hulked-out 9 year old was bad enough. Now there were FOUR. Still, he had to try. Getting the wand back was the only way he could return things to normal.

Later…
11413212122212.title: Dave had taken the wand with him

114132121222122.content:
Dave was closing in on Tim and his friends. He knew it. After having driven up and down every street on the other side of town, with no sign of them, Dave finally drove past the wooded area where they had landed earlier, noticing the four large craters they had made.

Dave parked his car on a nearby street and ventured into the woods, maneuvering past thick brush and fallen tree branches in the process. He had no idea what he would find or what kind of damage the four boys had caused at this point. Dave knew he was in way over his head. There was no way he could get the wand back now. Still, he continued on for some reason.

A short while later, Dave was nearly thrown to the ground, as Tim and his friends hurtled toward the earth again, causing another series of tremors as they landed in a clearing a short distance away. After the earth stopped shaking, Dave quickly hid behind a tree.

“Man that was awesome!” John said. “Did you guys see what I did to those parked cars? Those Hummers flew through the air like baseballs. And they weigh close to 3 tons!”

“Yeah, good thing I was there to catch them, though,” Seth chimed in. “They were hurtling toward that crowd of people on the street pretty fast.”

“Oh, like I would have let anyone get hurt,” John replied defensively. “You’ve known me since kindergarten. I hate it when anything gets injured. I don’t even like to squish bugs.”

“So, what do we do now?” Tyler asked, as he picked a rock the size of his hand off the ground and crushed it into powder. Dave saw his brother from around the corner of the tree. He could tell Timmy had used the wand on himself again. He now stood a good 2 feet taller than his friends, his body even more massive than before. There was no telling how strong he was at this point.

“Well, we’re too big for our hideout now,” Seth said, pointing towards what looked like a large, abandoned house in the middle of nowhere.

“Hey, I know,” Tim said. “Why don’t we—“Suddenly, all four boys heard a series of snaps and turned their heads in the direction of the noise. Dave looked down and noticed he had stepped into a pile of sticks by the base of the tree, not realizing they were there.

“Oh, shit,” Dave whispered to himself, as he pressed his back against the tree, hoping to blend in somehow.

“It seems someone has found our secret hideout,” Seth said.

“Let’s find out who it is,” Tim replied, walking towards the trees. “But DON’T hurt them.”

The four boys fanned out, determined to find the intruder. Dave knew he was trapped. He couldn’t just run away; he would be spotted immediately. For now, he was stuck, doing his best to remain hidden, while waiting for the best opportunity to escape.

Suddenly, a pair of gargantuan arms wrapped themselves around the tree Dave was hiding behind and ripped it out of the ground, before easily tossing it off to the side, the tree sailing for 30 feet before finally coming to a stop. Dirt rained down on Dave as he covered his eyes, doing his best to get the dirt out of his hair and clothes.

When he looked up, he saw____________ staring down at him.

1141321212221222.content:
Dave swallowed hard. his heart suddenly in his throat as he stared up at the smirking blond behemoth. Of all Tim's friends, Dave liked Tyler the least. The kid had a bad attitude, always talking back and acting tough. Dave was buddies with Tyler's older brother, Andrew, and Tyler was a constant pain whenever Dave went over to their house.

Now the annoying, pesky shrimp had become a towering muscle-god with unimaginable strength. Dave was certain this new titanic Tyler could crush him with one finger--and he feared the mega-boy might!

When the kids had been talking just now Tyler hadn't expressed any concern for the people that had almost died when John was tossing Hummers around. If anything he had looked disgusted by John's softness. Worse, Dave knew Tyler was a bit of a bully with kids who were weaker than he was, and now almost everyone on Earth was far weaker than Tyler!

"Well, well, look what I have here," Tyler gloated. With one jug-sized hand he seized Dave by the throat and effortlessly lifted the far smaller boy high overhead. Dave flailed and kicked desperately, but only hurt his feet on Tyler's adamantine abs. Tyler arrogantly flexed his free arm, his tanned left bicep swelling up to the size of Dave's head!

"You see that, weakling?" Tyler sneered. "I could squash you like a bug!"

Dave strained for breath, choking in the vise of Tyler's mighty hand. Tyler was really going to do it! This super-sized young Hercules was going to kill him!

"Put him down!" Tim's voice commanded. Drawn by the flying tree, he, Seth and John had finally arrived on the scene.

Tyler made a face, but opened his hand and dropped Dave to the ground.

Gasping, Dave started up at the quartet of preteen colossi that surrouded him.

"I said not to hurt him!" Tim scolded.

"He's fine! Ask him yourself!" Tyler argued.

"Are you okay, Dave?" your mammoth sibling asks you.

You glance at Tyler, who sneers down at you and pointedly flexes his medicine-ball sized pecs.

"Yeah," you say, intimidated to the core. "I'm fine."

"Good. Still, you shouldn't be spying on us!" Tim declares.

"Tim, you have to give me the wand back!" Dave insisted, ignoring his brother's admonition. "This isn't natural!"

"You've gotta be kidding! I've got the body of my dreams now, and you think I'm gonna give you the power?"

Dave had been recovering, gathering himself. Now he surged up, lunging toward Tim to try to grab the wand from his borther's back pocket. He felt his fingers touching the smooth wood when Tim instintively shoved him away. Dave went flying through the air, slamming almost immediately into Seth's diamond-hard chest. Bones snapped like twigs from the impact and Dave fell limply to the ground, coughing up blood.

"What'd you do?" John demands, his tone shocked and horrified.

"I-I didn't mean to!" Tim exclaims, equally upset.

"Do something fast!" Seth shouted. "He looks like he's dying!"

Unable to breath anymore, Dave's vision began to darken. Just before he would have lost consciousness he saw the flash of the wand-and just like that, the pain was gone. He saw up and drew in a deep breath, amazed to still be alive.

"Don't do that!" Tim bellowed. "You're lucky I was able to heal you in time!"

"Maybe you better let me hold onto the wand while you talk with your brother," Tyler suggests.

Distracted, his mind on the fatal injuries he had unintentonally inflicted on his brother, Tim handed over the wand without thinking, even as Dave screamed "No!"

With a sly smile on his face Tyler activated the wand.

11413212122212221.content:
Tyler laughed as he began to grow taller, his barn-door wide shoulders broadening further. Seth, John, and Tim watched in wordless shock as their blond friend grew larger and larger, his already gigantic muscles swelling with phenomenal new size and strength and power!

In the midst of this shocking transformation only Dave found the will to act. "Grab the wand from him!" he shouted to the stunned preteen giants. He didn't want Tim to have all of this power, no, but far better that his little brother have it than freaking Tyler!

Snapping out of his paralysis Tim lunged forward to take the wand back. Unfortunately the enchanted piece of wood was all but swallowed up in Tyler's grasp, leaving him to try to pry open the tow-headed titan's fingers. As the two struggled ferociously Tyler reached Tim's height of around ten and a half feet tall--and surpassed it!

Soon Tim was staring at Tyler's chin, then at his tree-trunk of a neck, and finally at the two biggest, most sculpted pair of pecs that the planet had ever seen.

With contemptuous ease Tyler tore his fist free from Tim's grasp, drew it back, and punched the smaller superboy in the sternum.

The ton of pure, solid muscle which was Tim's body went hurtling back, barely missing Dave and slamming into John and Seth, all three of them tumbling to the ground in a heap.

Staring down at the three fallen, groaning Goliaths Dave found himself thinking of how terrifyingly, unbelievably STRONG Tyler must be now, to be able to send Tim flying like that with just one punch! Slowly, dread curdling in his stomach, he turned to face the triumphant, transformed wand-wielder.

He was at least fifteen feet tall, a mind-boggling mountain of incomprehensibly immense, awe-inspiring muscle! Tyler's huge triceps were thicker than Tim's thighs, his biceps the size of full-fledged boulders! He had the most perfect pecs imaginable, overshadowing a fourteen-pack carved from what was surely the hardest substance on the planet now: Tyler's muscles! His legs were twin pillars supporting the rest of his divine form. Beneath his flaxen hair his face, which was now more brutally handsome than Dave ever would have believed possible, wore an expression of sneering pride and confidence.

And why not? Here stood physical strength and power incarnate, an unstoppable juggernaut of incalculable, irresistible might! Here was a true muscle-god, the ultimate alpha male! He just stopped the car in the middle of the parking lot, as soon as they arrived at the baseball field, which was located in the center of a large, public park in the middle of town. Luckily, the park was located about four blocks from their house. Truthfully, Tim could easily have walked from their house to the baseball field, and the only reason why Dave had driven Tim over there, was because his mother had insisted that he had done so. Especially now that Tim had become so big and so muscular, it would have taken Tim no time at all to jog down to the park from their house.

Dave just sighed for a moment. This was rather unexpected. On the other hand, it just broke his heart to say no to his little brother. He just didn’t know what to do….

“I dunno!” Tim shrugged. “I just did it to help ya, bro!”

Dave decided that this old coot had definitely lost it, but was still the only chance he had.

“I’m speaking of genies, of course. A genie has incredible powers, but without something to bound them to someone they’re their own masters and free to use their powers however they would like. You must trap him in this bottle. Then whom ever holds the bottle controls the genie... your brother.”

“Look, he may be on a power trip at the moment, but I don’t want to imprison Tim in that tiny thing. He’s a brat but no one deserves that.”

“You don’t need to keep him in it. Just trap him once to bind him to it, then let him out again and keep the bottle. Then you can make whatever wishes you want and he can live his life just like before.”

Dave had to admit, that sounded like a pretty good solution. “Ok,” he said picking up the bottle and examining it, “how do I trap him in here?”

“Just point the opening at him and remove the cap.”

Dave’s hand went to the screw on cap in question.

“NO!” the old man yelled. “Don’t touch that until it’s pointed at your brother. It has been primed and will accept anyone it’s pointed at. Even if they don’t have the powers of a genie. Once it has taken an owner they’ll be tied together forever.”

Dave nodded then looked to the old man. “Thank you for your help.”

“Thank you for yours.”

Minutes later Dave was back on the street and headed home with a solid plan in mind. As he rounded the corner onto his street he was nearly bowled over by Brandon headed the other direction.

“Brandon! Are you okay? How did you get out?” Dave asked.

“They let me go, but not before... well, I’d rather not talk about it. Let’s just say they spent a good amount of time humiliating me.”

Dave could see that Brandon was really shaken up by whatever they had done and decided to drop it for now.

“Look,” Dave said, “don’t worry about that now. I’ve got a way to fix things.” He explained to Brandon what the shopkeeper had told him.

Brandon’s eyes lit up. “This is exactly the sort of thing I was hoping you would say!”

Brandon nodded, though his head was still lowered. “Sure. Let’s just not get too far ahead of ourselves.”

As they approached home Dave realized that though the street was deserted he felt as though he were being watched. Closer inspection showed him that people everywhere were at their windows looking down the street at something. Nearly every house had at least one shade pulled aside and a pair of eyes looking down the street. Dave followed their silent gazes and saw something. Two hulking figures were standing on the front lawn of his house playing catch, but using a ball much bigger than any he’d ever seen. Dave couldn’t tell what Seth and John were tossing back and forth, but it must have been heavy because every time they caught it Dave could feel the ground shake a little.

As they got closer Dave began to realize what their giant ball was, and he was filled with a sense of dread.

“Dude, isn’t that...?” Brandon trailed off his question not wanting to say it.

“Yeah, it is.” It was the color that gave it away. There was only one thing on their block, maybe in the whole town, that was as obnoxious a shade of yellow as their neighbor’s Hummer H2. The massive SUV was no longer the right size or shape, though. Dave could see that the pre-teen titans had crushed and smashed the H2 into the general shape of a ball, though it was a ball bigger than either of them.

“How much does that thing weigh?”

“A little over 3 tons.” Dave said remembering they way Steven, the proud owner of what was now a massive paperweight, would boast about the size and power of his precious vehicle.

As Dave and Brandon arrived John, who was facing the boys, pointed over Seth’s shoulder. Seth turned and smiled at their approach.

“Look who we have here!” he said.

Dave could see that both boys, who had been about 4’ 9” when he’d left, were taller. Each was a few inches taller than Dave, in fact; perhaps 5’ 10” or so. Dave didn’t think their muscles had grown any, but the extra height did go a long way into making them much more intimidating.

“Welcome back, wimp.” Seth said, then looked to Brandon. “You too, pimple dick. Tim’s been waiting for the two of you.”

Dave held his fear back as best he could. “Look Brandon, kids grow up so fast these days. It’s too bad their brains can’t keep up with their bodies.”

John, who was currently holding the mangled SUV aloft in one hand, tossed the Hummer into the air towards Dave. The 3 ton hunk of steel landed about two feet to Dave’s left, digging a deep crater into the lawn, and causing such massive thud that Dave’s heart stopped for a few beats.

“Clumsy me,” John said moving next to Seth. Dave could now see that John was taller than Seth, but Seth outweighed John.

“You wouldn’t hurt me,” Dave said with confidence, “like he said, Tim’s waiting for me.”

John and Seth both laughed. Then, the more muscular of the two stepped forward, his bare arms and chest pulsing with power. Seth put his face right up to Dave’s.

“You don’t understand,” Seth said, “I could do whatever I wanted. I could break your legs with a flick of my fingers, and Tim would just fix it when he felt like it. I could crush your bones to powder and rip your arms off, and Tim could fix it with a snap of his fingers. But not before the pain made you beg for death.”

Dave gulped. “C’mon Brandon. Let’s go see my brother.”

As the two entered the house they did their best not to look back at where Seth and John were laughing.

Once inside Dave found Tim in the living room. Tim was playing video games on the biggest TV Dave had ever seen. The girls were no where to be seen, but Dave knew they were close. Tim wouldn’t just let them go that easy.

“Hey, bro,” Tim said standing and turning to face Dave. “Welcome back.”

Tim was taller too, a full foot taller than either of his friends outside. And, at 6’ 10”, he had also added a lot more muscle. Dave guessed Tim was nearly twice the size of John. But something else was different too, Tim’s face, he didn’t look quite so young anymore.

“What did you do? You look...”

“Older?” Tim answered for him. “I am. I decided it was strange for my ladies to be all over a 9 year old kid, so I made myself older. I’m 18. Now you’re my little brother in every way.” Tim flexed his gargantuan arms, his biceps exploding to 40 ridiculous inches around.”

Dave shook off this strange news and asked the question that was really bothering him, “Where are my friends?”

“Ladies!” Tim called.

11413212221111222121122.content:
Dave shook away the hopeful, wayward thought. After everything he had just been through, it was probably natural for him to wish that what the picture depicted was part of the wand-induced craziness he'd just fixed. It'd be pretty sweet if everything wrong in his life was actually a result of the wand's use, but it simply wasn't the case. The truth was that Jackie, Rachel and Brittany had been in love with Tim ever since they'd met him.

It drove Dave absolutely crazy with jealousy! His nine year-old little brother had been dating the three hottest girls in his high school simultaneously for months now, while he couldn't even get a freaking date for Saturday night! Even worse, their romantic relationship had started the day Dave had brought the girls over to his house for the first time. The very instant they'd met Tim, all three had zeroed in on their ideal heartthrob, completely ignoring him and Brandon while they flirted shamelessly with the nine year-old who had stolen their hearts. By the time they'd left that evening, Tim had been the boyfriend of the trio, each more than willing to share him rather than risk being excluded from his romantic attention.

To this day, he couldn't figure out what on Earth Jackie, Rachel, and Brittany saw in his younger brother! Whatever it was, their devotion to him was total; only last week he'd overheard Jackie talking to Rachel about how the four of them should move to Utah as soon as Tim graduated high school, so that he could marry all three of them at the same time.

Jealousy had frequently tempted him to rough Tim up a bit, but he never had. Not after that first time, when Seth had hoisted him overhead by the throat with a single pillar-thick arm and had threatened to use him in a tug of war match with John. He had practically pissed himself in fear that the dark-haired, massively muscular eight year-old giant would follow through on his threat, and that terrifying memory had stayed Dave's hand ever since. Worse, Tim had used the intimidation factor of his junior Juggernaut buddies to pretty much make Dave do whatever he wanted.

In Dave's opinion, Tim's friendship with Seth and John was additional proof that his little brother was the luckiest person on the entire freaking planet! Not only had he secured the love of three beautiful women while he was still just a kid, but he had also befriended two hulking, super-strong muscleboys around his age, a pair of mighty preteen titans who could effortlessly lift multiple tons with one finger! No wonder Tim had tried to make himself like John and Seth, given the chance! Thank God Dave had undone that little trick! Bad enough that Tim's best friends were awe-inspiring, ultimate alpha males; how much worse would it be if Tim himself was a young Hercules?!?!

"Looks like you did it; everything's back to normal. Now let's get out of here!" Brandon urged, casting a dark glance at Tim and his loving harem.

Poor Brandon! He didn't have much more luck with women than Dave did. He was right, they should take off. It wasn't like he could punish Tim for what he'd done with the wand, not while was friends with John and Seth.

Of course . . . Tim had been ignoring them a lot lately in favor of his girlfriends. Maybe, just maybe, he and Bradon could take the clearly bored muscle-godlings out for a whole day of fun at the carnival and try to get them on HIS side!

Or would they just laugh at him once he was done spending all of his money on making them happy?

Perhaps he and Brandon should head back to the old man's shop instead. If he had something as good as the wand available, who knew what other enchanted items he might have for sale!

Then again, look how the wand had backfired! Was it even worth the risk of trying to buy and use another magical item?

John watched as Tim flexed and sighed. “You’re so lucky. You were born with such big muscles and you’re super strong too. I wish I could grow as big as you are.”

“I may be able to build muscle easy, but I also worked for these.” He said as he hit another pose. “It’s not like I waved a magic wand and poof!” Playing around, he waved the wand in his hand, and something shot out from the tip and hit…

Tim, making him considerably bigger and stronger than Seth
1142112.content:
The beam of light from the wand struck Seth in the right shoulder and the small, dark-haired eight year-old immediately began to change. His stick-thin limbs started to fill out with muscle and his T-shirt, which had been a little too big for him a moment ago, was suddenly skin-tight across his newly defined pecs. His biceps and triceps grew to be truly gigantic while his legs swelled into thick tree-trunks of pure power. His shirt split at the seams and fell away, unable to contain his broadening shoulders and deepening chest any longer. His pecs were like two cannon balls now and beneath them was a perfectly chiseled, eight-pack set of abs. The ruined T-shirt on the floor vanished and a tank-top appeared to conceal Seth's massive chest and ripped torso. His blue cotton shorts were replaced by a black work-out shorts composed of a smooth, shimmering material and his ordinary Nikes were transformed into a pair of fancy sneakers that looked like they cost more than Dave's car.

The wand slipped from Tim's nerveless fingers as his eyes played over his friend, staring in shock at what Seth had become.

The last aleration that the dumbfounded Tim took note of was to Seth's expression. The third grader had always been conscious of his status as the youngest among them; he was frequently reminded that John and Tim were older than he was and knew more than he did. And of course Tim's left little finger had probably been stronger than Seth's whole body . . . at least until now.

So Seth had been the baby of the group and had looked it. Now he had become a mega-built super-boy, easily as big and muscular as Tim, and he no longer wore the anxious, beseeching look he had so often in the past. Instead he looked cockily self-confident and arrogantly sure of himself. It was an expression Tim had only seen previously in the mirror.

"Yeah, John," Seth agreed, acting as if NOTHING HAD HAPPENED, and pointedly flexing his mountainous, 23 inch right bicep right in front of the older boy's face. "Even if you could build muscle like us, you're too much of a wimp to work out as hard was we do," Seth claimed dismissively, openly admiring the incredible peak of his amazing arm.

John dropped his gaze down from the eight year-old's mammoth muscles and meekly muttered, "I know, Seth. I just wish I could be like you and Tim."

What the heck was going on here, Tim wondered in frantic bewilderment. Why were his friends acting like it was NORMAL for scrawny Seth to suddenly be his size? They were acting like nothing had changed!

While Tim was trying to figure things out, Seth smirked and said to John, "You should be wishing to just be like me. I'm a year younger than Tim and I'm already at least as big as he is. Soon I'm gonna be even bigger!" he predicted proudly, hitting a devastating double bicep pose and sending an openly challenging glance toward Tim.

The words and the defiant look broke through Tim's haze of confusion and enraged him. Already world famous as the strongest boy on the planet, he was used to nothing but awe and adultation from his peers. Heck, from everybody! Since the day he'd started school most of the kids had BEGGED to be his friend! He'd been nice enough to let Seth hang out with him and now the pumped-up punk was trying to compete with him? Trying to be better than he was? Momentarily forgetting all about the wand Tim stepped forward and glared at Seth, deliberately shifting into an awe-inspiring most muscular pose.

"You think you can beat this?" he growled menacingly.

Every time he'd shown off like this in the past the other person had instantly backed down. Seth, though, didn't seem intimidated at all. He only smiled and answered, "Yeah, I do."

He mimicked Tim's pose, his straining, flexing muscles clearly equalling Tim's breathtaking display of brawn. In fact, on Seth's smaller frame, his muscles looked even larger than Tim's!

Tim licked his lips uneasily, even as Seth's confidence seemed to soar higer than ever. With a grunt the eight year-old pushed himself to the max, his godlike physique seeming to be even more cut and sculpted than Tim's!

How-how could he be losing?!? He was the strongest kid in the world! HE was number one, not Seth! This was completely wrong, and it was all the fault of that stupid stick!

Seth relaxed from his professional quality pose, his point made. He sneered at Tim.

"Told ya I was getting bigger then you!" he gloated, punctuating his point by aggressively ramming Tim's chest with his own. Tim stood his ground without budging a millimeter, but the urge to punch his friend in the face was overwhelming.

Standing safely off to one side John tried to play peacemaker.

"Come on, guys, you're both huge!" he said placatingly as Tim and Seth turned toward him. "You don't have to compete with each other. You're called the "Twin Titans", remember? What does it matter which of you is bigger?"

His words interested Tim less than the fact that the ten year-old was nervously fiddling with the wand! He must have picked it up while Tim and Seth were having their competition. The wand that had somehow changed everything . . . and that could probably change it back!

"Give me that!" Tim bellowed, lunging for the wand. Letting out a squeal of fright John fell backward, tripping over his own feet. Tim dropped to his knees beside his fallen friend and grabbed for the stick. He wrenched it out of John's grasp, only to have Seth's hand close around the lower part of the wand.

"I think the biggest kid should get the toys, don't you?" he taunted. Together they wrestled for the wand over John's prone, cowering form. The tip swung first toward one, then toward the other as they pitted their incredible strength against each other.

"Give it to me!" Tim insisted. He needed the wand to set everything right!

"I'm the biggest," Seth snarled. "I'm the boss now!"

With those words the wand went off, it's beam striking

Within a minute or so, not only was your brother a heavily-muscled kid, but so was Seth and John. They all looked like professional bodybuilders now. Their clothes grew right along with their bodies, their shirts going from a small to a large in a matter of moments. They also shot up a few inches in height, to accommodate their massive frames now.

You stare open-mouthed at your brother and his friends now. They each grew probably close to 40 pounds of muscle, making their compact size all the more intimidating.

"What are you looking at, Dave?" Tim asked, a confused look on his face. "Do I have something on my face?"

"N-no," you respond, wondering why no one else noticed the changes that took place.

"Wow," Brandon says, walking over to Tim and his friends' huge bodies. "How did you guys get to be so big?"

"Just good genetics, I guess," Seth responded, flexing one of his arms. "I mean, it's like we don't even have to lift weights that much. Just do a few sets, head back home and the next morning,we've grown even more."

"I wish I could be your size," Brandon said, motioning down towards his own skinny frame. "But I was stuck with the worst genetics you can have for building muscle."

"Hey, don't sweat it, man," Tim said, slapping Brandon hard on the back. Well, hard for Brandon, anyway. "You'll get there someday."

"Well," Tim said, remembering why they all walked into his brother's room in the first place. "Mom wanted me to tell you to go ahead and just warm up leftovers. She's going to be late in getting home tonight." He glanced down, noticing the wand on the floor. He picked it up, deciding to keep it for some reason.

"As for us, we're going to hit the gym one more time today, then we're spending the night at John's house." The three muscular children left the room, changing into their gym clothes before they leave.

"Wow, I am SO jealous of your brother, Dave," Brandon said. "I mean, he has PERFECT genetics."

"Yeah, yeah," Dave half-mumbled, not really paying attention. Then it dawned on him. The wand! His brother had the wand! If Tim or any of his friends figure out how to use the wand, there was no telling what would happen. He had to get it back.

But how would he do it?

114221.content:
Dave waited until his brother went into his room to change into his gym clothes, while his two friends went into two other rooms to change. Dave left his friends behind for a moment, determined to get the wand back before his younger brother found out how the wand actually worked.

Dave very slowly opened Tim's bedroom door, half-expecting him to be sitting on the bed, in the middle of changing. Luckily, he was not. He was, however, in a newly furnished bathroom adjacent to his room. "How did that get in here?" Dave thought to himself, as he walked further inside, trying to be as quiet as he could be. Dave looked around Tim's much larger room now, amazed at how much it had changed in the past few minutes. It was probably double the size of his own.

Dave walked over to Tim's bed, finding the wand lying next to his gym bag. He picked it up and inspected it. It looked all right; nothing seemed broken or out of place. As he turned around to leave, he ran into something. A rather short, heavily muscled something.

"Dave? What are you doing in my room?" Tim asked, looking up a his older brother. He was now wearing his gym attire, which consisted of a large tank top shirt, the arm holes larger that normal to accommodate his larger frame and a pair of shorts to allow his legs to breathe while he worked out. He looked up at Dave with anger in his eyes.

"Well," Dave said, trying to make up some excuse out of thin air. "I-I thought I would come in here and...give this wand back to its' rightful owner." He tried to walk past his younger brother, but Tim simply sidestepped and blocked his path.

"What are you doing with a wand in the first place?"

"A kid in the neighborhood asked me to fix it today. She's like six or something, I think." Dave began to sweat nervously, intimidated by Tim's massive size.

"Well, maybe I want to keep it," Tim said, throwing his weight around a little. "I mean, it's not really my thing, but I could find some way to use it." He gripped the arm of his brother that was holding the wand and Dave winced in pain. "What are you wincing at? I barely touched you."

"Now give me the wand back." Tim tried to take the wand from Dave and his brother decided to fight back. But after a few minutes of struggling against his much stronger brother, Dave stopped resisting.

Tim laughed as he pried the wand from Dave's hand. "Did you actually think you could take this from me? I mean, you're a flabby, pathetic weakling compared to me."

Tim pointed the wand at his brother and Dave leapt for it one more time, determined to get it back. This time though, whether it was from the increase in adrenaline or something else, Dave actually succeeded in pointing the wand away from himself.

"I'm impressed, bro," Tim said, laughing again. Just then, the wand began to shine bright again, illuminating both brother's faces in the process. "What the hell?" Tim asked, perplexed.

The beam shot out and struck one brother. Both siblings were holding onto the wand, so both should be aware of the changes about to occur. Who did the beam hit?

And since we feel extra powerful today, we figured there was no way our clothes were up to the task. I mean, just look at my bicep already. I swear it’s bigger than it was at the cafÃ©.”

Flexing up her arm and motioning Dave to feel her muscle, her bicep inflated to outlandish proportions as Dave pulled his hand on top. He had never seen a bicep this big, much less touch one. And especially on a girl only 19 years old and only 5 foot 2! He rubbed it for a moment, growing hard down below at the erotic sense of power Jackie possessed. She smiled up at him as she released her flex.

“Well if that turned you on, you’re going to shoot your load before we’re done today.”

Dave flushed as Jackie giggled. The other girls were piling weights on the bench press bar, continuing until they had on 3000 pounds! Well passed their previous best.

And before he knew it, the teen-age muscles girls began bench pressing weights no human had ever even dreamed of lifting before. 3000 pounds was quickly followed by 6000 pounds, then 8000 pounds! Jackie saddled up next to Dave, giggling.

“I just benched 4 tons, Dave. And it was EASY! I feel like a Supergirl! How much do you think we’ll be able to lift?”

Dave, already having an idea, shrugged his shoulders as he swallowed nervously.

“I’m not sure, but you three are already the strongest humans on earth.”

Jackie giggled. “Yeah. The only challenge now is amongst ourselves. But what do think will happen if we become so strong that even these massive weights become toys?”

Dave went white with lust and concern, his erection pressing painfully forward, which only caused Jackie to giggle more. “Well I guess I know what you think anyway.”

As camera crews started showing up and the crowd thickened, the three uber girls continued to stack on ridiculous weights and hoist them with equally ridiculous ease. 10,000 pounds moved up to 12,000, then to 15,000, then to 18,000, then to 20,000 pounds! 10 tons of steel! For the first time, Rachel showed some strain, even if it was a little. Brittany showed less strain and amazingly, Jackie showed even less.

At 22,000 pounds, Rachel had reached her limit and couldn’t complete the lift. Fortunately, Brittany and Jackie were spotting. Brittany was able to get off two lifts, while Jackie cranked out 5 before stopping.

At this point, Rachel, all 4 foot 10 of her was flexing up for a camera and talking to a reporter. Her pumped up muscles had grown bigger from the work out and her biceps bulged to 24 inches around, putting most every man in the gym to shame.

The weights were upped to 24,000 pounds and this time Brittany could not complete the lift. This left only Jackie. She slid under and with a look of determiniation, lifted the bar with the gigantic plates down to her chest and back up with a short yell. Exhaling with confidence, she then proceeded to push out a couple more for good measure and stopped. The crowd noise was another mix of cheers and claps and snaps of cameras.

As Rachel went back to her flexing and her interview, Brittany had pulled in some of the football players bold enough to stick around. Brittany giggled at their pathetic struggles and to everyone’s surprise, began to juggle the men, tossing each into the air, catching them, and then tossing them back up. She continued to do this until four large men were being flipped high into the air. Jackie had brushed off the reporters for the moment and slid back to Dave. She still had to look up at him as David tried to take her all in. Her muscles had expanded and hardened, looking like silk covered boulders were covering her entire body. She flexed up her right arm and a 28 inch bicep erupted into a dense ball of power. Dave began to sweat as Jackie licked her lips.

“So I can now bench press 12 tons Dave. I could lift more if I had to. What do you think about that?”

At this point, Dave was fumbling for the wand, afraid of what was going on, but mostly of losing the girls to a mesmerized populous. Jackie was toying with him, but he wasn’t so sure she wouldn’t leave him hanging. Rachel and Brittany hadn’t even acknowledged his existence since they entered the gym. He didn’t want anything bad to happen, but this was quickly growing beyond his original intent. As Jackie began to bob her bicep up and down and flex her granite chest forward, causing the rubber bikini to groan, Dave could only imagine Jackie as the Supergirl she was becoming. What IF the girls became even more powerful? With too many thoughts spinning around, Dave touched the wand and before he could firm up a coherent wish, the familiar bolt shot out and…..
12231.title: Dave and the girls go to the gym

12233.content:
Dave walked beside Jackie, as all four made their way towards the gym a few blocks away. As they walked, Dave couldn't help but notice the expressions on the townspeople's faces. He half expected them to be at least a little put off by the three muscular girls, but it seemed to be just the opposite. They looked almost happy to see them. He watched as most of the passersby brought out their cell phones and took pictures of them as they passed, while a few kids, mostly girls, ran up to them and asked for their autographs.

They happily obliged, as a small crowd quickly formed around them, with most of their fans holding 8 x 10 photos of the girls. Dave was fortunate enough to not be caught in the middle of the whole thing, being able to maneuver his way through the throng of fans. He was now standing off to the side, beside a stop sign, waiting for the crowd to disperse.

While he waited, Dave looked at a few shops that dotted that particular street. The first one he came to was a Foot Locker, with a poster of Jackie that was hanging in the window. Intrigued, he walked closer and discovered she was a spokesperson for her own brand of Nike shoes in this reality. The poster read "Get a good workout" along the top and "with a pair of Cougars" along the bottom, with Jackie hitting a double biceps pose in the center. There was also a picture of a pink cougar off to the side, in an attack stance ready to pounce, next to Jackie.

In the next window, there was a poster featuring Brittany and Rachael, with their own brands of shoes coming out in the next couple of months, along with their own flavor of Powerade already in stores. Dave couldn't help but smile, knowing he was fully responsible for their celebrity status.

As he continued looking at the poster, Dave felt a pair of strong hands grab his shoulders. "Doing a little bit of window shopping?" He turned around to see it was Jackie smiling up at him. Rachael and Brittany were close behind, having finished signing autographs and posing for pictures.

"You girls ready?" he asked.

"Yeah, sorry about that," Rachael replied. "Ever since we signed with Nike and Powerade last year, stuff like that has been happening pretty much every day."

"Comes with the territory," Brittany said nonchalantly as she stretched, flexing her massive arms in the process. "Being the strongest women in the world and all."

"Still, it's time for our workout. We should go," Jackie reminded the others. They all agreed and continued on to the gym. A short while later, they arrived. As soon as they went inside, Dave realized this place was more of a fitness facility, rather than a hardcore gym where serious lifters could gain muscle. How could Jackie and the other girls get a good workout with the equipment they had in this place? Looking at the dumbell rack along the side of the wall, Dave noticed the highest the weights went up to was 120 pounds. Surely, Jackie and the others could lift 10 times more than that by now just for their warmup sets.

"Come on, Dave," Jackie said, as the other girls made their way towards the back of the gym. "I'll show you where we work out." Dave followed along, watching as most of the other gym goers stopped what they were doing to watch her pass by.

"Don't worry about them, Dave," Jackie said, referring to the gawkers. "They know to keep their distance. Well, they do NOW, anyway." She giggled a little bit and Dave wondered what exactly had happened to keep the other gym members in line. They soon caught up to Rachal and Brittany, who were busy changing into their workout clothes.

"Okay, let's do it!" Rachael said a few minutes later, as she put on her weight belt and laid down on the bench, gripping the bar. Dave stared at the amount of weight she was about to lift. The plates themselves were several times thicker than a regular plate and each one appeared to weigh at least 200 pounds each, if not more. He watched as Rachael gripped the extra thick bar and lifted the weight, before lowering the bar to her chest and cranking out 20 to 30 reps, for one of her warm up sets. Dave counted the total amount of weight on the bar and guessed she was lifting a little more than 1500 pounds, if he was correct about the plates, that is.

Rachael sat up after racking the bar and looked down at her chest. "Wow. I think my chest is already a little bigger." Dave's eyes wandered down to her cleavage and, although he had never really caught himself staring at Rachael that much in the past, he had to agree that her chest looked larger than it had been at the cafe earlier.

"Just how easy is it for them to build muscle now?" Dave wondered, as Rachael stood up.

"Okay, it's my turn," Brittany said, taking Rachael's place on the bench. Dave stood by the wall, watching the workout progress, as each girl was eventually able to lift 2000 pounds, then 4000, then 6000. At one point, he wondered if there were enough weights in the gym to give the girls a sufficient workout.

As they moved on to incline presses, Rachael took a pair of dumbells, each one weighing over 1500 pounds, and laid back down on the bench. She was able to do six reps easily, but had to have a little help with the rest of the set. Brittany and Jackie took the dumbells from her hands afterward and Rachael sat back up.

"I wish I was as strong as you, Jackie," Rachael said, a little out of breath, as she stretched her muscles a little.

Giving him the perfect excuse to use the wand again, Dave took it out of its case and wondered just how strong he should make Rachael. As strong as Jackie? Even stronger? What would happen if her muscles swelled even larger than Jackie and Brittany's combined? How would THAT change things?

Deciding that being as strong as Jackie would be enough, at least for now, Dave pointed the wand at Rachael and...

122332.content:
Just as Dave was about to use the wand, his eyes wandered to other parts of the gym. A little ways from where Jackie and the other girls were working out, he could see the cardio bunnies running on the treadmills, with some watching whatever program was playing on the overhead TVs, while the others had their iPods blaring, trying to drown out any outside noise as they ran. On the opposite side of the gym, near the front door to be exact, he could see a handful of women doing some kind of circuit training routine, using the pink, 5 pounds dumbells as they each did a set of bench presses, dumbell curls, military presses and lunges, before starting the circuit over again.

Dave then glanced back at Jackie, as she was busy hammering out yet another set of 8000 pound incline presses, gritting her teeth as she fought to get the weight off of her immense chest, while Rachael and Brittany egged her on. Dave sighed. "It's a shame that more women aren't as strong as Jackie," he thought, as he turned around to use the wand on Rachael.

But before he could do so, the wand lit up, firing various beams that hit every person in the gym and caused all the women there to become the same size as Jackie. And, presumably, they were all as strong as her, too. Dave cursed himself, as he realized that he had allowed yet another errant thought to change the world around him without his consent.

Curious, though, he looked back towards the cardio bunnies and realized that most of the treadmills were gone, save for a few that occupied each corner of the gym, all of them unoccupied. The women that were using the treadmills before were now busy performing dumbell curls with 1500 pounds in each arm and grunting loudly, as they struggled to finish their respective sets, before finally dropping the weights, causing a terrible thud to reverberate throughout the gym.

The circuit trainers Dave had seen earlier were still there, only now they were using weight well over a ton to complete their workouts. Even the music playing in the gym had changed. Before, there was light rock of some kind coming through the speakers. Now, it was heavy metal, the music turned up as loud as possible, in order to keep everyone there psyched up for their workouts.

Dave also realized that he was the only guy in the gym now and wondered why that had happened. Maybe the guys who used to go there had their egos crushed to find out that there were women who could lift much more than they ever could. Or maybe this was a women's only gym. Or maybe there was some other reason that Dave hadn't discovered yet about this new reality. I mean, just how different were things now?

He put the wand back in its case again, before walking back towards Jackie and the others as they appeared to be almost finished with their workouts. "Having fun?" he asked.

"Not anymore," Rachael said, as she dabbed the sweat from the back of her neck with a towel. Brittany was busy putting the dumbells back on the racks, while Jackie was sitting on a bench, chugging a protein shake.

"Sorry it took so long," Jackie said between sips. "But you know how it is when we workout. Sometimes it takes us a couple of hours to get finished."

"Don't worry about it," Dave replied, pretending he knew what she was talking about. To him, he had only been in the gym for about 15 minutes, but because of the reality shift, it had apparently been a lot longer. "I'm used to it by now."

"Well, come on, girls," Brittany said, picking up her gym bag and taking a big drink from her water bottle. "We have a full day ahead of us." Jackie and Rachael followed close behind, while Dave brought up the rear. As he was walking, Dave wondered just how different the world was now and as he reached the front door of the gym and made it outside, he had his answer.

As she reached her final height of 6 foot 5 her wedding cake tiered biceps were flexed up to over 100 inches around with the strength to curl an M-1 tank for reps!

Katherine now spoke with authority as the most powerful being on earth.

Still gripping the wand, Dave stumbled forward, very much wanting to do what Katherine wanted, but also remembering that this wasn’t his intent. With a pang of guilt, Dave heard Brittany come out of the pool. He then thought decided to…

So Brandon and Dave tried to take their chances with these two girls while the others went away.
The two guys placed themselves on the table next to the girls and tried to get their attention…
14.title: girls in the cafe

choices: Kemonomimi-obsessed otaku Zack...
Somewhat bitchy man-hating lesbian Ophelia...
Ditzy but friendly girl Carol...
143.content:
"Hey ladies!! Did it hurt when you fell?" Brandon opened, hoping to start a conversation with the ladies with an intentionally corny line. However, these ladies, very attractive, weren't necessarily into men, if you get my drift, and were tired of guys hitting on them... very tired. Before Brandon and Dave knew what was happening, the two ladies grabbed them by their arm and judo flipped them over their backs and through the chairs the ladies had been sitting in. "A simple 'not interested' would have sufficed..." Brandon groans as he rubs his back writhing on the cement. Slowly, he hobbles to his feet and pulls Dave up with him, slinking back to their table. However, what Dave fails to notice was when the lesbians sent him flying into the pavement alongside Brandon, the wand flew from his pocket.

A fat acne-ridden nerdy man in glasses wearing a Tokyo Mew Mew shirt responds to the beatdown, "Damn man. You got owned... By a girl!! A hot girl!! That's so hot!!"

"Oh shut up, ya stupid otaku." Dave vents on the stranger, embarrassed still from the surprise emasculation that was mainly Brandon's fault.

"Tell me to shut up..." the otaku mutters. He then noticed the wand on the ground, remembering seeing it fall from that curt fellow's pocket, but now he doesn't feel like telling him he lost it. Before he goes to investigate, his cell rings, the sounds of "Scarlet Witch" (the opening theme to "Dog Days") filling the air. "This is Zack..."

"Carol, let's go. All these assholes made me lose my appetite..." one of the lesbian ladies said.

"Aw, Ophelia, but I wanted to try their parfait... I heard it was the best in town... Oh, alright." As she got up, she kicked an ornate and fascinating stick out from under their table. However, before Carol leaned in for it, she got distracted by a moth flying around her.

"Carol... Come on..." Ophelia groaned.

Who nabs the wand first?

info.brief_description: A wand changes reality as holder wants changes lives of all. Open to anyone to add10/3Edit
info.description:
A Wand of unbelievable power falls into the hands of an unlikely person, which proceeds to change life in unexpected ways. While walking around town with his friends Dave and his friends enter a previously unnoticed store which sells antiques and curios of all sorts.

EDIT 10/3: I've seen that many people lean toward the teenage characters more, myself included. There just seem to be more that you can do with highschool aged people in school. So I've decided to change the ages of the Main Characters; the storyline will remain the same and the created stories will remain the same seeing as no real contium problems will be had. Sorry for any and all confusion.

MAIN CHARACTERS
Dave: 17; 5'8" 250lbs, short brown hair, hazel eyes; overweight, not ugly but not good looking an "Average Joe".
Brandon: 16, 5'6" 140lbs, longish unkempt brown hair, blue eyes; skinny tattooed rocker type, the ladies man.
Jackie: 15, 5'2" 100lbs, long red hair, green eyes, B cup breasts, the cute friend. likes Brandon.
Rachel: 16, 4'10" 80lbs, long black hair, brown eyes, A cup, waifish asian freind. http://home.comcast.net/~abyssdemon/rachstory.jpg
Brittany: 17, 5'8" long dark brown hair, hazel eyes. Very attractive but down to earth. loves video games and likes Brandon too. http://home.comcast.net/~abyssdemon/britlandscape.jpg
Tim: 9; 4'4" short dirty blonde hair. Daves Little Brother; always annoying Dave and his freinds because he has huge crushes on Jackie, Brittany, and Rachel.
Other Minor characters can be added but please give a description when introduced into story.

THE WANDS POWER: The Wand has the ability to change a person almost anyway the holder wants, but it is extremely powerful so holder may not be able to control it completely. When used The Wand CHANGES THE REALITY OF THE WORLD and ONLY the person holding the wand realizes the changes, everyone else thinks things have always been however the wand changed.

Almost all changes allowed as long as the general power of the wand is respected but no vore or violence.
